mapper.select: SELECT no,name,loc,tel,num FROM (SELECT no,name,loc,tel,rownum as num FROM hospital WHERE loc LIKE '%'||#{loc}||'%' AND name LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%') WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} ORDER BY no
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM hospital WHERE loc LIKE '%'||#{loc}||'%' AND name LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%'
SELECT dname FROM dog WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT no, reception_date, name, dname, reserve_date, reserve_time, state, hosname, num FROM ( SELECT no, reception_date, name, dname, reserve_date, reserve_time, state, hosname, rownum as num FROM( SELECT no, TO_CHAR(reception_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as reception_date, (SELECT name FROM member WHERE id = (SELECT id FROM dog WHERE dno = dogno)) as name, (SELECT dname FROM dog WHERE dno = dogno) as dname, reserve_date, reserve_time, state, (SELECT name FROM hospital WHERE no = hosno) as hosname FROM reserve WHERE dogno = (SELECT dno FROM dog WHERE dname = #{dogname}) AND reception_date BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 0.99999 ) ) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT no FROM reserve WHERE dogno = (SELECT dno FROM dog WHERE dname = #{dogname}) AND reception_date BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 0.99999 )
